Write something you want to see. - @Karaszewski #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory #Sundance
I think that's what's valuable is your perspective, how you view the world. - @IssaRae on "Why me?"  #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
When I was starting out, I used to send it out to people hoping they wouldn't write back so I could just stop. - @jillsoloway on writing
Audience Q: Does writing ever get easy? @IssaRae: As a procrastinator
column4: no. @JillSoloway: Decide what your hours are. Protect your process.

text: Lean towards diversity, that will help things out - @Karaszewski on whether a writer should collab when writing about other ethnicities
What's interesting...is it's what books tell you not to do - and that is mix tones..but to me, that's what real life is - @karaszewski
.@Karaszewski elaborates on the idea of 'theme' to say he looks at it more specifically as 'point of view' #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
For me almost more important than this idea of 'theme' is, let's call it the 'nugget' i.e. "What are you trying to say?" - @martinoxon
You have to have a voice in this business - @GPBmadeit  #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
LIVE NOW - Art of Episodic Writing with: @IssaRae @martinoxon @Karaszewski @jillsoloway @GPBmadeit #ArtFilmWeekend  https://t.co/qg9yU8hHLX
I developed a pilot for a concept. It was called 'I Hate L.A. Dudes' - It was a true story. - @IssaRae #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
I think of the pilot like a puzzle. The pilot needs to have an engine you can return to in episode after episode - @jillsoloway #Sundance
The easy way to write TV is it's binary, but that's just not life. - @martinoxon #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
.@martinoxon commenting on the lifestyles in GIRLFRIENDS‚Äô GUIDE TO DIVORCE: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a trick. I really wanted to write about sexual politics."
Sometimes you want to write away from what people are really feeling - @martinoxon #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
I remember you saying you write to turning points. - @sundancesatter to @GPBmadeit #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
What we were doing is exploring this theme that women have been at the forefront of movements. - @GPBmadeit explaining a SHOTS FIRED scene
It's about the woman trying to reclaim herself as the subject in her own life - @jillsoloway on her new show I LOVE DICK #ArtFilmWeekend
When OJ came up, it was the one time that we were like YES - @Karaszewski on how he & his cowriter liked the the complexity & jumped on it
We call 'Shots Fired a 10 hour film. - @GPBmadeit on giving her show a film aesthetic. #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
I started in TV. My first job was 'A Different World'. It was my favorite show. - @GPBmadeit #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory
I was able to take my movement, especially about rootable female protagonists...and put them in TV, and things do change. - @jillsoloway
I feel what movies were in the 1970's is what TV is right now - @Karaszewski #ArtFilmWeekend #PowerOfStory #Sundance
I think what really drew us to a move over to television is that is where the good storytelling is happening right now - @Karaszewski
All you need to create a writer is one dysfunctional family. I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs true, but in my case it worked. - @martinoxon
I wanted to be in television since the nineties. I think the first television taping I went to was 'Moesha' - @IssaRae #ArtFilmWeekend
Please welcome my panel. A lot of #girlpower up here - @sundancesatter #PowerOfStory #ArtFilmWeekend https://t.co/zkiCtpsPUS

The story of climate is ultimately very simple: Will we choose life? Will we choose a sustainable future? - @algore. #TheNewClimate
Every night on the news is like a nature hike through the Book of Revelations...people are getting it. - @algore. #TheNewClimate
Our beings need to build relationships with the sources of life: water, air, earth, sun. - Dave Archambault. #TheNewClimate #PowerOfStory
It wasn't until the #StandingRock movement blew up that the Army Corps of Engineers listened to the request for an EIS. - Dave Archambault
It takes a lot of courage to create change, and to be a change agent. - Tribal Chairman Dave Archambault. #TheNewClimate #PowerOfStory
Past 400yrs has been run of genocide/slavery that built the road for industrialization. We just got the bill: #ClimateChange. @heather_rae22
In Canada, indigenous people are leading environmentalists on what to do. Not joining, leading. - @DavidSuzuki. #TheNewClimate

The first movie sparked the questions. Now we have the answers. - @jeffskoll referring to @aitruthfilm. Goes on to say we'll solve this.
Clean energy is the least expensive power source, period. - @jeffskoll. #TheNewClimate #PowerOfStory
.@jeffskoll came to realize "the best way to effect change in a mass way was through movies." #PowerOfStory #TheNewClimate #Sundance
The fundamental idea of @eBay was that strangers can trust each other to do the right thing. - @jeffskoll. #PowerOfStory

column4: you can't - it's illegal because the lawmakers are controlled by oil biz - @algore

text: In President Nasheed's case, the family that pushed him out had the oil contracts in the Maldives. - @algore. #PowerOfStory
The sustainability revolution is unique in scope, but it has the speed of the information revolution. - @algore. #TheNewClimate
.@MohamedNasheed thought he'd find safety by becoming a politician. That wasn't the case. #PowerOfStory #TheNewClimate
I started out as a journalist. Every time I would write, they arrested me. I've been tortured twice - @MohamedNasheed. #PowerOfStory

Any change in sea levels will have impacts on the Maldives. - @MohamedNasheed. #TheNewClimate #PowerOfStory
